document.full_text: helmut kohl, the former german chancellor, urged his fellow germans this week not to give up on european integration. "i don't see any reason for any kind of pessimism," mr. kohl said.
document.title: kohl makes plea for european unity
lines_and_colors: helmut kohl, the former german chancellor, urged his fellow germans this week not to give up on european integration. "i don't see any reason for any kind of pessimism," mr. kohl said.
